1.title: See You Soon
1.plot: As Pride fights for his life in the ICU, the team searches for the hit woman who tried to kill him.

2.title: Inside Out
2.plot: Special Agent Hannah Khoury joins the team as they search for a former IRA bomb-maker who was smuggled into the country. Meanwhile, Pride considers a new position with the agency during his medical leave.

3.title: Diplomatic Immunity
3.plot: While NCIS investigates the murder of a Navy intelligence officer killed during a conference for foreign diplomats, the key witness cozies up to Sebastian. Also, Pride has some trouble adjusting to his new position at the agency.

4.title: Legacy
4.plot: When a petty officer is found murdered under a shrimping boat, the investigation uncovers a conspiracy in the fishing community.

5.title: In the Blood
5.plot: Pride's father, Cassius Pride, is wrapped up in an NCIS case involving a notoriously unsolved casino heist from several years ago. Also, Pride meets a family member he never knew existed.

6.title: Pound of Flesh
6.plot: The NCIS team uncovers evidence of a suspect who is harvesting organs from multiple victims after Pride's assistant, Ginny Young, escapes from a kidnapper. Also, Pride turns to his friend, Commander Calvin Atkins, M.D., for medical and spiritual guidance as he struggles with the ramifications of his recent brush with death.

7.title: Sheepdogs
7.plot: Following a deadly car explosion in the French Quarter, the team interrogates a professor and former member of a student protest organization; Tammy discovers a secret about Hannah's personal life.

8.title: Close to Home
8.plot: The NCIS Team puts an informant in protective custody during a murder investigation. Meanwhile, Pride needs help from his brother in order to become trusted by informant.

9.title: Risk Assessment
9.plot: After a Navy contractor is mysteriously murdered, The team begins their investigation and unearths evidence that they lived two separate lives for decades.

10.title: Tick Tock
10.plot: Pride is forced to free an old adversary when his friends are held hostage. In the meantime Pride's angel is hanging around for no apparent reason until the end.

11.title: Vindicta
11.plot: Pride and the team want to take down a secret and lethal group of former intelligence agents. Pride and his brother deal with their loss.

12.title: Desperate Navy Wives
12.plot: While undercover, Gregorio joins a social club for military wives after one of the members is contacted by an ex-boyfriend on the FBI Most Wanted List.

13.title: X
13.plot: NCIS investigates the disappearance of a Navy entomologist after a deadly shooting at a research lab. Nero, with Naval Intelligence, joins the investigation when the team discovers a rare and deadly virus was also stolen.

14.title: Conspiracy Theories
14.plot:
Know what this is about?

15.title: Crab Mentality
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: Survivor
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: Reckoning
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: In Plain Sight
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Musician Heal Thyself
1.plot: A case turns personal for Pride when the body of a Petty Officer is identified as a former gang member he once mentored. Meanwhile, Brody continues her search for the perfect place to call home in New Orleans.

2.title: Carrier
2.plot: NCIS Special Agent Tony DiNozzo assists the New Orleans team when a Navy lieutenant on liberty dies of the bubonic plague. The team races to locate all additional sailors on liberty, control a potential outbreak and determine the source of the highly infectious disease.

3.title: Breaking Brig
3.plot: The NCIS team investigates the crash of an armored transport bus carrying Naval brig detainees after four prisoners escape, including a black market broker who is one of the country's biggest national security threats. Meanwhile, Pride turns to Gibbs for assistance when a case file needed for the investigation is full of redactions.

4.title: The Recruits
4.plot: After a Navy SEAL is found murdered in a sorority house, the NCIS team must determine if the motive pertained to one of his classified missions or collegiate foul play. Meanwhile, Pride's daughter, Laurel, pays the NCIS office a visit. Shanley Caswell stars as Pride's daughter, Laurel.

5.title: It Happened Last Night
5.plot: The NCIS team is given a 22-hour deadline after the murder investigation of a Chief Warrant Officer who specialized in counterintelligence reveals his wife had been kidnapped and is being held for ransom. Meanwhile, Senior FBI Agent Fornell travels to the Big Easy to assist with the case.

6.title: Master of Horror
6.plot: With New Orleans decorated for Halloween, the NCIS team investigates the murder of a Naval Staff Judge Advocate found in a cemetery dressed in a Victorian costume with vampiric puncture wounds on her neck. Meanwhile, the team debates what Halloween night activity and costumes would be best.

7.title: Watch Over Me
7.plot: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a Navy Officer with the highest level top secret clearance who was recently assigned as a tech liaison with a private developer.

8.title: Love Hurts
8.plot: A petty officer is found dead in a Mardi Gras float storage facility with an engagement ring and proposal plan in hand. The investigation takes a mysterious turn when the team are unable to locate his supposed long-term girlfiend.

9.title: Chasing Ghosts
9.plot: When a Navy-issue pistol is found in a dead robber's bag, the gun leads to a 38-year-old cold case that hits close to home for Loretta. Laurel returns to Thanksgiving with a surprise.

10.title: Stolen Valor
10.plot: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a retired SEAL who tracked down individuals impersonating military personnel. But the case takes a mysterious turn when the lead suspect is found with the Navy-issued jacket of an officer believed to have been killed in the line of duty in Afghanistan. Also, Brody discovers the normally holiday-obsessed Lasalle is inexplicably unenthusiastic about Christmas.

11.title: Baitfish
11.plot: The investigation into an explosion at the Navy-Marine Corp Relief Gala reveals Pride was the bomb's target.

12.title: The Abyss
12.plot: When a Navy Admiral's daughter is the prime suspect in a double murder case aboard a research boat, the NCIS team partners with the Coast Guard Investigative Service (CGIS) to work the case. Meanwhile, Lasalle tracks down his estranged brother.

13.title: The Walking Dead
13.plot: The team attempts to solve a murder before it takes place, after a Navy lieutenant commander discovers that he has been poisoned with a deadly amount of radiation.

14.title: Careful What You Wish For
14.plot: When an NCIS Agent is gunned down on a detail that Brody was on, the team discovers that the agent's murder was personal.

15.title: Le Carnaval de la Mort
15.plot: After a Petty Officer is found murdered in the midst of Mardi Gras events, the NCIS team investigates what parades and parties led to his untimely death. Also, Pride must decide what aspects of his strained relationship with his father he is willing to share with his daughter.

16.title: My Brother's Keeper
16.plot: After a Navy recruiter is the target of a lethal hit and run, the NCIS team investigates whether the murder was tied to her career or her role as a foster mother to two brothers. Also, Lasalle grows increasingly concerned for his brother's welfare after welcoming him into his home.

17.title: More Now
17.plot: Pride becomes convinced his nemesis "Baitfish" has returned and, in an attempt to locate him, instructs the team to investigate crime scenes and the chase leads from New Orleans to Charleston, S.C.

18.title: The List
18.plot: After a sailor is murdered in the champagne room of a strip club, the NCIS team links the murder weapon to two additional unsolved cases and discovers that the names of all three victims appear on a mural in a dilapidated part of town. Also, Brody's ex-fiance pays her a surprise visit.

19.title: The Insider
19.plot: While conducting an autopsy on a Petty Officer who is believed to have died from natural causes, an armed man enters the morgue and holds Wade, Sebastian and Danny hostage.

20.title: Rock-a-Bye-Baby
20.plot: When a Navy Commander's car is stolen with his baby inside, the NCIS team must determine if this was a random carjacking or a targeted abduction.

21.title: You'll Do
21.plot: Lasalle's brother, Cade, is accused of murder and Lasalle is determined to prove his innocence, in spite of all the evidence against him. Lasalle is officially off the case, so he helps ATF Agent Percy take down an arms dealer.

22.title: How Much Pain Can You Take?
22.plot: To send a message to Pride, Baitfish murders someone close to the NCIS team, prompting a citywide manhunt for the elusive criminal. Dylan Walsh guest stars.

23.title: My City
23.plot: Pride suspects a mole among the ranks as NCIS and local law enforcement continue to track the Broussard Syndicate after new intelligence suggests a breach at the ports.

1.title: Sic Semper Tyrannis
1.plot: An explosion on the Crescent City Bridge reveals that radical groups of anarchists are joining together near New Orleans and Pride must go undercover to find out who is behind it all.

2.title: Shadow Unit
2.plot: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a blogger dedicated to exposing government corruption and cover-ups and discovers a Navy Seal and CIA humanitarian mission with a dark secret.

3.title: Touched by the Sun
3.plot: When a female combat pilot and Navy hero dies in an air-show plane crash, the NCIS team must investigate if it's the fault of the pilot or the new jet that was just approved to deploy to bases globally.

4.title: I Do
4.plot: The NCIS team must determine why a murdered Navy drone pilot was using a black market drone to obtain military surveillance, and whether the drone's footage is linked to his death.

5.title: Foreign Affairs
5.plot: Agent Pride and his team are sent a partner from the Australian Defense Force Investigative Service to investigate a murder with connections to international nuclear weapons negotiations.

6.title: Insane in the Membrane
6.plot: The team joins the city's annual Red Dress Run but must bow out when a Petty Officer is found dead from a drug overdose.

7.title: Broken Hearted
7.plot: The life of a genius Navy coder employed by Brody's mother, Oliva Brody, hangs in the balance after the heart intended for his transplant is stolen.

8.title: Confluence
8.plot: After traveling to Texas to escort a key witness to the trial of an infamous arms dealer, Sonja and Special Agent Pride are ambushed.

9.title: Darkest Hour
9.plot: During a city-wide blackout that impedes law enforcement and emergency response teams, Pride vows to solve the murder of a family friend's fiance.

10.title: Billy and the Kid
10.plot: A Marine's murder reveals new clues in the first case LaSalle and Pride worked together after Hurricane Katrina; a Thanksgiving celebration at Pride's bar.

11.title: Blue Christmas
11.plot: When a string of Christmas burglaries turns deadly, the evidence leads the NCIS team to Wade's adopted son, Danny (Christopher Meyer). Also, Lasalle and Brody tease Sonja about the high stakes of drawing Pride in the team's Secret Santa exchange.

12.title: Sister City: Part II
12.plot: Sebastian flies to D.C. to work with Abby Sciuto on the forensics in the case involving her brother, while Ellie Bishop comes to New Orleans to deliver a package and help Pride and his team on the case.

13.title: Undocumented
13.plot: The team investigates the murder of an immigrant Petty Officer that was made to look like a suicide and, in the meantime, creates an online dating profile for Pride.

14.title: Father's Day
14.plot: Pride and Mayor Douglas are abducted from their respective Mardi Gras events and held captive by a mysterious assailant.

15.title: No Man's Land
15.plot: The team searches for a soldier believed to be a prisoner of war in Afghanistan when his prints are found in a crime scene.

16.title: Second Chances
16.plot: The team tracks stolen Navy TNT to a cocaine warehouse run by Sonja's childhood friend.

17.title: Radio Silence
17.plot: The NCIS team protects a local DJ from a threatening perpetrator and investigates the murder of a Navy Captain who was attacked while on-air with the radio show. Also, Pride's daughter, Laurel (Shanley Caswell), returns home to discuss her future plans.

18.title: If It Bleeds, It Leads
18.plot: Brody thinks a sailor hit by a party bus in the French Quarter is connected to her sister's death when similarities between the two are discovered.

19.title: Means to an End
19.plot: A surveillance van filled with photos documenting Pride's every move is discovered after his daughter is attacked on campus.

20.title: Second Line
20.plot: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a Navy Lieutenant during a French Quarter second line funeral procession, a New Orleans tradition that celebrates the recently deceased with a musical street parade.

21.title: Collateral Damage
21.plot: After a Navy lieutenant dies during a clandestine visit to a general's hotel room, Special Agent Pride and the CIS team are asked to break standard protocol for the murder investigation.

22.title: Help Wanted
22.plot: A Navy culinary specialist is the target of an explosion while visiting her family's restaurant in the French Quarter. Also, Brody is in D.C. tracking a lead in the General Mathews leak case.

23.title: The Third Man
23.plot: The NCIS team partners with Homeland Security after the murder of a Navy master diver is linked to chatter of a foreign attack on the city.

24.title: Sleeping with the Enemy
24.plot: The NCIS team uncovers a mole in the ranks while working with the Department of Homeland Security to locate 900 missing pounds of explosives that pose an imminent threat to New Orleans.

1.title: Aftershocks
1.plot: The NCIS team partners with several federal agencies to track a sniper who is targeting crowded events in the city. Also, FBI Special Agent Tammy Gregorio arrives to investigate Pride and his team.

2.title: Suspicious Minds
2.plot: Pride faces further backlash from the FBI when he helps former Navy Intelligence Analyst Elvis Bertrand, who is the lead suspect in a multiple homicide case.

3.title: Man on Fire
3.plot: After a decorated petty officer is found dead inside a sports arena, evidence leads Pride and the NCIS team to a kidnapping case of a petty officer who was last seen in Mexico.

4.title: Escape Plan
4.plot: Sebastian is kidnapped after lunch with his Mother and forced to use his gaming skills to assist in a prison break.

5.title: Course Correction
5.plot: Pride and his team investigate the crash of a private plane in a bayou, while LaSalle and Percy interview potential replacements for Brody.

6.title: One Good Man
6.plot: The NCIS team reviews unorthodox training exercises after a Navy Seal candidate is found murdered weeks before his graduation. Also, a concerned Wade turns to Pride after her adopted son, Danny, announces his plan to enter the Navy.

7.title: Outlaws
7.plot: The team investigates a sailor's murder during a rowdy motorcycle rally. Meanwhile, Lasalle asks for advice about his personal life from Gregorio.

8.title: Music to My Ears
8.plot: Pride takes temporary custody of a 9-year-old boy who's the sole witness to the murder of his aunt - a member of the United States Navy Band.

9.title: Overdrive
9.plot: Foul play is suspected when a Marine corporal who is an amateur race car driver has a fatal crash on the track.

10.title: Follow the Money
10.plot: When the Coast Guard boards a yacht that is in an area that is used by smugglers, they find the Captain with the crew's waiter who is dead. They try to get him but he resists and kills him. The Coast Guard calls Pride because the yacht belongs to Javier Garcia. Pride thinks Garcia was smuggling something. He calls the FBI to tell them about it and sends LaSalle to help Gregorio. Pride discovers one of the passengers is someone he knows and that she's engaged to Garcia. Instead of arresting the men who took off the yacht what they were bringing in Gregorio decides to ...

11.title: Let It Ride
11.plot: Sebastian is sent undercover and Patton exercises his former gambling skills, as Pride and the team attempt a dangerous operation to trap Garcia.

12.title: Hell on the High Water
12.plot: During a murder investigation, Pride gets trapped on an oil rig that's about to explode due to a gas leak.

13.title: Return of the King
13.plot: After thousands of classified government files are stolen, the NCIS team searches for an underground group of hackers co-founded by Pride's old contact, Elvis Bertrand, who are known for exposing corruption among prominent people in New Orleans. Also, Sebastian joins the team as a newly minted NCIS Special Agent.

14.title: Pandora's Box: Part II
14.plot: McGee and Torres come to New Orleans to help Pride and his team search for a missing homeland security theoretical terror playbook.

15.title: End of the Line
15.plot: A gruesome copycat murder on a street car reopens a former case for Wade, evoking painful memories from her past.

16.title: The Last Stand
16.plot: Pride's longtime friend, state and military attorney Rita Devereaux, asks NCIS to investigate the disappearance of a JAG lawyer who specializes in classified cases and volunteers at a private military academy.

17.title: Swift, Silent, Deadly
17.plot: The team searches for a Marine who assaulted six men in a bar.

18.title: Slay the Dragon
18.plot: Tammy reunites with her ex-husband, who not only embezzled millions in Katrina relief funds, but is also connected to the murder of a crime boss' son.

19.title: Quid Pro Quo
19.plot: The team races to find an antidote for a super virus.

20.title: NOLA Confidential
20.plot: LaSalle's old Vice partner is the prime suspect when a link is discovered between the New Orleans police department and an international drug ring.

21.title: Krewe
21.plot: While Pride listens in on a wiretap of Mayor Hamilton (Steven Weber), the NCIS team investigates a train heist of hundreds of Navy weapons. Featuring a two song performance by GRAMMY Award winner Sheryl Crow from her upcoming album By Myself, including the first single "Halfway There" and the world premiere of "Roller Skate."

22.title: Knockout
22.plot: Pride thinks he's found a new link between Mayor Hamilton and the illegal activity in Clearwater when a Navy Chaplain is murdered.

23.title: Down the Rabbit Hole
23.plot: After Pride is spotted tracking one of Mayor Hamilton's (Steven Weber) accomplices, the suspect opens fire on a crowded street before disappearing.

24.title: Poetic Justice
24.plot: Unable to trust anyone in New Orleans, the NCIS team calls in FBI Assistant Director Isler (Derek Webster) to help expose and stop the sinister scheme Mayor Hamilton (Steven Weber) has planned for the residents of Clearwater, on the third season finale.

1.title: Rogue Nation
1.plot: While Pride remains on probation six weeks after his rogue takedown of the corrupt Mayor Hamilton, his team is closely monitored by Supervisory Special Agent Paula Boyd (Becky Ann Baker). Also, when the FBI arrives to run lead on a case involving a stolen big rig of nuclear waste, the team must secretly investigate from the sidelines.

2.title: #1 Fan
2.plot: While preparing to leave on a fishing trip, Martha Roberts (Dendrie Taylor), an erratic whistle-blower who calls Pride her mentor, kidnaps him to help her locate a serial killer targeting young women in the Gulf of Mexico.

3.title: The Asset
3.plot: Pride and the Gang team with FBI to find a Russian with important info on sleepers in the USA.

4.title: Dead Man Calling
4.plot: The team investigates the copycat murder of an unsolved case from 150 years ago that spawned a legendary ghost story; Gregorio is spooked when the case is connected to a recent séance and a local medium.

5.title: Viral
5.plot: Sebastian is placed on administrative leave when the FBI questions his response in a foot chase to apprehend a high value fugitive.

6.title: Acceptable Loss
6.plot: The murder of a petty officer leads Pride and his team to a mysterious woman who is targeting men with high security clearance. Also, Lasalle's father, Beau (Michael Angelo Pniewski), arrives in town to discuss the family business.

7.title: The Accident
7.plot: Patton must work with his ex-wife, who's spearheading a clinical trial of brain implants in Veterans that's been hacked.

8.title: Sins of the Father
8.plot: Wade's son is attacked at his girlfriend's house and he calls Pride for help when she goes missing.

9.title: Hard Knock Life
9.plot: Pride second-guesses evidence suggesting that homeless kids murdered a petty officer.

10.title: Mirror, Mirror
10.plot: After Rita Deveraux (Chelsea Field) tells Pride that Douglas Hamilton (Steven Weber) is about to make a deal to get out of prison, Pride and the team rehash the Clearwater case in hopes of locating his mystery partner and spoiling his bargaining chip. Stacy Keach guest stars.

11.title: Monster
11.plot: Percy reconnects with her old ATF partner when an armed robbery and high-speed chase is connected to an undercover ATF operation.

12.title: Identity Crisis
12.plot: Sebastian receives a plea for help from his high school friend Adrian Conner (Kristen Hager) after her business partner is killed at the Crescent City Gaming Convention. Also, FBI Special Agent Raymond Isler (Derek Webster) believes Adrian is a hacker the Cyber Crimes division has been tracking for years.

13.title: Ties That Bind
13.plot: A petty officer's murder leads the team to a family-owned night club where Pride's mother used to perform weekly. Also, Lasalle must urgently return home to Alabama after receiving an unexpected call from his family.

14.title: A New Dawn
14.plot: The team investigates the murder of a petty officer who was helping a refugee family being recruited by terrorists.

15.title: The Last Mile
15.plot: Pride helps FBI Special Agent Isler with an off-the-books opioid theft investigation.

16.title: Empathy
16.plot: The team investigates the disappearance of a congressional aide after a hitman saves her from two men posing as agents.

17.title: Treasure Hunt
17.plot: The team investigates the murder of a Navy Lieutenant Commander who was looking for a 200-year-old marble and gold fleur-de-lis during the annual Contraband Days pirate festival.

18.title: Welcome to the Jungle
18.plot: Pride, Sebastian and Tammy go to South America when an old colleague asks Pride for help with a classified operation that's been compromised.

19.title: High Stakes
19.plot: Percy and Lasalle go undercover at a high-stakes, underground poker game after the organizer targets players with access to a naval research laboratory. Also, Laurel Pride (Shanley Caswell) visits her dad during spring break to discuss options after her upcoming graduation.

20.title: Powder Keg
20.plot: A group of volatile thieves hold Pride and his bar patrons hostage.

21.title: Mind Games
21.plot: Gregorio calls on Claire McDermott (Deirdre Lovejoy), her former behavioral science professor, when the team's latest case matches one she studied during FBI training.

22.title: The Assassination of Dwayne Pride
22.plot: When journalist Oliver Crane (Mark Gessner) posts a scathing article documenting Pride's "reckless use of justice," the team is concerned about the fallout from the piece and the confidential information included in the story. Also, Rita Devereaux (Chelsea Field) warns Pride that someone in D.C. has coordinated this attack on him, and the article is just the beginning.

23.title: Checkmate, Part 1
23.plot: Pride recruits an unofficial team to clear his name but more importantly save NOLA. With his off the books team along with the usual NCIS squad, is Dwayne able to save NOLA again or will this prove to be the case that costs him everything?

24.title: Checkmate, Part 2
24.plot: Pride recruits an unofficial team to clear his name but more importantly save NOLA. With his off the books team along with the usual NCIS squad, is Dwayne able to save NOLA again or will this prove to be the case that costs him everything?

locations: Pearl River Turnaround, I-59 at MS state line
Plaza Tower, 1001 Howard Ave, New Orleans::(exterior scenes)
imdb.title: NCIS: New Orleans

other companies.name: Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post

plot: A spin-off of _NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service (2003)_ (qv) about the local field office of NCIS that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment and decadence. This colorful city that harbors a dark side is a magnet for service personnel on leave, and when overindulgence is followed by trouble, Special Agent Dwayne Pride's team is at its best.
